title: On the sine-Gordon--Thirring equivalence in the presence of a boundary
abstract: In this paper, the relationship between the sine-Gordon model with an integrable boundary condition and the Thirring model with boundary is discussed and the reflection $R$-matrix for the massive Thirring model, which is related to the physical boundary parameters of the sine-Gordon model, is given. The relationship between the the boundary parameters and the two formal parameters appearing in the work of Ghoshal and Zamolodchikov is discussed.
